ai-tha-ap531:0.3_0: He went to the shoulder-blacks of the senior monks.
ai-tha-ap531:1.2_0: who has gone beyond all things.
ai-tha-ap531:2.2_0: and then the fruits of that person.
ai-tha-ap531:2.4_0: walking mindfully in the shade of the terrace.
ai-tha-ap531:3.2_0: having raising his joined palms to him.
ai-tha-ap531:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap531:4.4_0: This is the fruit of that.
ai-tha-ap531:5.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap531:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap531:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhaṇḍagāma.
